publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-191.3 Colin Fox: Modernising Justiceâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-191) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, leave out from "notes" to end and insert "calls on the Scottish Executive to reverse cuts to legal aid resources and take immediate steps to reduce the workload of the Crown Office and Procurator Fiscal Service and sheriff courts."
